document_data.name: Allis Lhyssich's Hand Crafted Weapons and Magical Weapons for Noble Causes
document_data.mainbody: '''Allis Lhyssich's Hand Crafted Weapons and Magical Weapons for Noble Causes''' was a specialist [[weapon]]s store that also had standard gear for sale.
document_data.Location: The shop was located close to the south gate of [[Neverwinter]].
document_data.Services: The master blacksmith, [[Allis Lhyssich]], was one of the few smiths able to create [[magic]]al weapons with [[meteorite]] ore. The crafting procedure took three days to make these highly enchanted meteorite weapons.
